Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
Renderer class is responsible for generating pixel color map from a graphic scene, using ImageWriter class

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Render()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void printGrid​(int step, Color color)
    Create a grid [over the picture] in the pixel color map. given the grid's step and color.
    void renderImage()
    This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object
    Render setAdaptiveSampleFlag​(boolean adaptiveSampleFlag)  
    Render setAdaptiveSampleLevel​(int adaptiveSampleLevel)

    Camera setter

    Image writer setter
    Render setMultithreading​(int threads)
    Set multi-threading
    - if the parameter is 0 - number of cores less 2 is taken
    Render setRayTracer​(RayTracerBase tracer)
    Ray tracer setter
    void writeToImage()
    Produce a rendered image file
